title: Hibert Spaces for Sci/Engr
description:
Structure of linear operators in infinite dimensional spaces, applications.
  Credit cannot be received for both MATH 6338 and MATH 6580.

prerequisites: MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2406 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 4305 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
